children.structure_process: 1. Opening Image → 2. Theme Stated → 3. Set-Up → 4. Catalyst → 5. Debate → 6. Break into Two → 7. B Story → 8. Fun and Games → 9. Midpoint → 10. Bad Guys Close In → 11. All Is Lost → 12. Dark Night of the Soul → 13. Break into Three → 14. Finale → 15. Final Image

children.examples: Legally Blonde, Finding Nemo, Iron Man

children.terminology: 2. Theme Stated → Thematic Premise / Leitmotif Introduction
5. Debate → Internal Conflict / Dramatic Question Formation
6. Break into Two → First Plot Point / Act Transition
7. B Story → Secondary Plotline / Thematic Counterpoint
8. Fun and Games → Genre Fulfillment / Narrative Elaboration
9. Midpoint → Central Turning Point / Narrative Reversal
10. Bad Guys Close In → Rising Action / Complication Intensification
11. All Is Lost → Apparent Defeat / Crisis Point
12. Dark Night of the Soul → Anagnorisis / Existential Crisis
13. Break into Three → Second Plot Point / Resolution Setup
15. Final Image → Narrative Closure / Visual Bookend
